name: fashion-case
short_effect: Holds Pokémon Accessories for use in Contests.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A fancy case for the tidy and organized storage of colorful Pokémon Accessories.
flavor_text.platinum: A fancy case for the tidy and organized storage of colorful Pokémon Accessories.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A fancy case for the tidy arrangement and storage of whimsical Pokémon Accessories.
